page.title: 17The Ambulances.
page.content: When called out to an emergency the ambulance travels as quickly and safely as possible.The driver isn't supposed to drive through red traffic lights. In the cab one of the most important pieces of equipment is the radio.The radio can be heard quite clearly over twenty five miles away. The Craven Arms ambulances are numbered from 90 to 99.If you wish to identify the ambulance each has a colour band around it,West Midlands is red,Wolverhampton is black and Shropshire is gold. The ambulance runs on L.P.G.and petrol.
